Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home headed east on CR 400S in Lafayette IN. Upon driving up a hill, my friend noticed a bright orange light in the sky. We pulled over and watched the object slowly head west and then east. The object then quickly increased altitude until it was no longer visible. I was able to get a very poor quality photo on my phone. I work in the aviation industry, and this was no sort of conventional aircraft.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around July 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright orange orb headed west, and then altered trajectory and headed east before increasing altitude out of visual range.
